ArgonTest.Name: Access module private method in different module
ArgonTest.InputSource:
module _
import Argon.Core::* import ::Module2::MyInstance
proc main(): () do MyInstance.my_module_private_method() end

module Module2
import Argon.Core::*
public trait MyTrait private internal proc _.my_module_private_method(): () = puts "called my_module_private_method" end
public instance MyInstance: MyTrait end
